name: They came from space and make us... CUBES!!!
name_original: They came from space and make us... CUBES!!!
description:
They came from space!

Secret lab in ######## day ## ## 20##.

Experiment goes wrong, the "CUBE MATTERY" break out, and chnage people to cubes.

And make us... CUBES! 

Now, you have to survive 10 waves of deadly cubes, and destroy  "THE BOSS" ,  by shooting cubes right in to they square faces, to save the world from cube matter. But be carefull. there is too much of them!

*this game is my first 3d game in unity. (before i made some dreams 3d games and some test projects in unity3d)*

This game was made for: Quarantine Jam!!!

*Few models were made few hours before the gamejam.*
*Have fun!*
*unity project broke out, so i dont gonna do anythink with it later*
